text: Lorraine Bénic (born July 27, 1937) is a Canadian painter, sculptor and printmaker. Bénic was born in Montreal. Her work is included in the collections of the Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec and the Musée d'Art Moderne de Paris ==References== Category:1937 births Category:20th-century French women artists Category:21st-century French women artists Category:Living people
title: Lorraine Bénic
